itemInfo.itemDesc: A seed used to obtain Fire Flake Flowers, an Alchemy ingredient, by Farming. You can begin Farming after using a Fence to create a Garden. This produce takes up 1 space in a Garden.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Wild Herbs and Fire Flake Flowers using Bare Hands or a Hoe.\n(Right-click to display the closest Fence Exchange location)
